data.title: Best Small Organization Intranets 2011-2020
data.meta_description: Small companies (less than 2,000 employees) can have excellent intranets. 18 teams explain their winning designs and the processes that led to success. 312 full-color screenshots.
data.text:
Through detailed case studies, screenshots, and best practice examples, this report showcases trends and challenges of past winning intranets at companies ranging from 200 to 2000 employees. The showcased intranets were chosen based on expert review of the design and usability of hundreds of nominated intranets, reprinted from the Intranet Design Annuals 2010-2018.

Article: Should Small Companies Have an Intranet?

Topics

714-page report:

18 case studies of exemplary small-company intranets

Design patterns that contribute to the winning intranetsâ€™ success

Common themes among winning intranets

Tips on how to incorporate usability fixes into your intranet

Methods and technologies used to achieve each organization's intranet vision

Before and after designs, usually hidden behind firewalls

312 full-color screenshots to show you what works
